document_data.name: Mayzcake
document_data.mainbody: '''Mayzcakes''' were flat but fluffy [[mayz]] [[bread]] staples of [[Maztican]] cuisine.
document_data.Description:
Mayzcakes were made using a corse paste of crushed mayz and [[pepper]], hand-patted They were commonly served along with hot bubbling [[Maztican bean stew|bean stew]], or even fruit. Most of these  dishes could be taken on the road.

Hot spiced [[cocoa]] was sometimes served with mayzcakes wrapped around cooked [[egg]]s.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1361}}, [[Erixitl]], The Chosen Daughter of [[Qotal]], was kindly invited to share a hearty meal of mayzcakes and stew with mother [[Tzilla]]. The lone woman packed a satchel of mayzcakes and stew for Erixitl's travel the following day as she departed [[Ulatos]] in attempt to stop the looming war between Ulatos and [[Amn]].
